text: The Democratic Party (, Demokratska stranka, ) is a centre-left and social- democratic political party in Serbia. It claims continuity of the historical Democratic Party. The Democratic Party is a member of the Socialist International and Party of European Socialists. Former President of Serbia Boris TadiÄ‡ was a member of the Democratic Party until 2014. Category:Socialist International Category:Social democratic parties in Europe Category:Political parties in Serbia
title: Democratic Party (Serbia)
